means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 卡里奇绰号，来源于古法语，含义是“勇气”(courage)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都可表示"勇气，胆量"之意。
means: courage ： 普通用词。指面对危险或困难时无所畏惧的精神和敢于奋斗的进取心。
bravery ： 指在危险中表现出的无所畏惧精神或在逆境中仍能坚持下去的毅力。
backbone ： 指性格倔强，意志坚定，有骨气，有顽强的决心去做某事。
nerve ： 侧重指面临危险或在冒险的情况下具有冷静、清醒的头脑和坚定无畏的勇气。

sentence.Network_en: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.--Winston Churchill
sentence.Network_cn: 成功不是终点，失败也并非末日，最重要的是继续前进的勇气。

sentence.Network_en: He showed great courage by admitting that he is an alcoholic.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以极大的勇气承认自己酗酒。

sentence.Network_en: Every person stood to applaud his unforgettable act of courage.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有人起立为他不可磨灭的英勇之举鼓掌。

phrase.cizu_name: have the courage of one's convictions

jx.jx_en_mean: act on one's beliefs despite danger or disapproval
jx.jx_cn_mean: （无视困难或非难）敢于按自己的信念（做）

phrase.cizu_name: pluck up (或 screw up 或 take) courage

jx.jx_en_mean: make an effort to do something that frightens one

phrase.cizu_name: take one's courage in both hands

jx.jx_en_mean: nerve oneself to do something that frightens one
jx.jx_cn_mean: 鼓起勇气去做；敢作敢为

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting the heart, as the seat of feelings): from Old French corage, from Latin cor 'heart'

entry.def: Courage is the quality shown by someone who decides to do something difficult or dangerous, even though they may be afraid.

example.ex: General Lewis Mackenzie has impressed everyone with his authority and personal courage...
example.tran: 刘易斯·麦肯奇将军的威信和勇气给所有人留下了深刻的印象。

example.ex: They do not have the courage to apologise for their actions.
example.tran: 他们没有勇气为自己的行为道歉。

entry.tran: 有勇气做自己认为正确的事
entry.def: If you have the courage of your convictions, you have the confidence to do what you believe is right, even though other people may not agree or approve.

example.ex: Developers should have the courage of their convictions and stick to what they do best.
example.tran: 研发人员应该对自己充满信心，坚持做自己最擅长的事。

means.word_mean: 1. a quality of spirit that enables you to face danger of pain without showing fear

example.en: A couple of shots of Dutch courage and he was ready to face anything.
example.zh: 借着两杯酒下肚后的一时之勇，他居然就要准备要去对付一切。

example.en: How about a little Dutch courage to help you through the first acl?
example.zh: 喝一点点酒帮你壮壮胆通过这笫一关，怎么样？

example.en: Too much Dutch courage and you're in permanent trouble.
example.zh: 吸毒太多，你是永陷苦海了。

auth_sentence.content: I just hope that other people find that courage.
auth_sentence.res_content: I just hope that other people find that courage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I just hope that other people find that courage.

auth_sentence.content: That not only takes intelligence, it takes courage.
auth_sentence.res_content: That not only takes intelligence, it takes courage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That not only takes intelligence, it takes courage.

auth_sentence.content: I wanted to have the courage and I killed.
auth_sentence.res_content: I wanted to have the courage and I killed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I wanted to have the courage and I killed.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =run,表示"跑,发生,快速做……"; 2. =heart,表示"心脏,一致"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 旅游服务员,导游;送急件者;信使
stems_affixes.word_buile: cour跑,发生,快速做……+ier人→跑的人→信使

stems_affixes.value_cn: 课程,教程;过程,进程;路程,路线;一道菜
stems_affixes.word_buile: cour跑,发生,快速做……+se→跑[走]的依据
suc下面+cour跑,发生,快速做……→在下面活动[发生]→在下面顶着→救助
cour心+age状态→来自心的状态→勇气, 精神

stems_affixes.value_cn: 擦洗,擦亮,[搜索或追捕时]急速走遍
stems_affixes.word_buile: s快速+cour跑,发生,快速做……→快速发生,跑

Sentence.sentence: American politicians will have to develop the courage to follow what is taught in all American public-policy schools: that there are good taxes and bad taxes.
It must because of the sort of the thing we'd all love to do once in a while and never quiet have the courage to.

means.word_mean: 勇气, 胆量,勇敢,无畏

sentences.en: She showed remarkable courage when she heard the bad news.
sentences.cn: 她听到这坏消息时, 表现出非凡的勇气。

jushi.english: She showed remarkable courage when she heard the bad news.
jushi.chinese: 她听到这坏消息时,表现出非凡的勇气。

jushi.english: He lacked the courage to tell them that he was going out.
jushi.chinese: 他没有勇气告诉他们他将要离开的消息。

jushi.english: He is a man of courage.
